meanings.definition: A person from the same country as oneself.
meanings.sent1: My countrymen celebrate our national holidays together.
meanings.sent2: The countrymen gathered to discuss local issues.
meanings.sent3: Our countrymen always bring the best snacks to the community potluck.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, our countrymen stand united like a strong oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The bond between countrymen is unbreakable, like a chain made of steel.

meanings.sent1: The countrymen in the village were known for their farming skills.
meanings.sent2: He greeted his countrymen with a warm smile.
meanings.sent3: The countrymen decided to start a band and play at the local fair.
meanings.sent4: The countrymen worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The group of countrymen resembled a colorful mosaic, each bringing their unique talents.
